subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Nets shot 50 percent from the field in the first half and had a 46-45 halftime lead, but the Heat pulled away in the fourth quarter to take a 2-0 lead in the series.
snippet: The Nets shot 50 percent from the field in the first half and had a 46-45 halftime lead, but the Heat pulled away in the fourth quarter to take a 2-0 lead in the series.
